addtionRulesDesc: This season does not have any special rules.

<size=36><color=#FFD145>Season Rules</color>
• Players ranked Beggar will always have a Wonder card in their starting hand.
• The above rules only apply during Ranked Battle mode for the current season.
• These rules change with each season.

<size=36><color=#FFD145>Season Rules</color></size>
Players ranked Beggar will always get a Wonder card in their hand.
Players ranked Poor will always get a set of four cards in their hand.
These rules only apply during Ranked Match for the current season.
<size=24><color=#909090>These rules change with each season.</color></size>
